title: Best Online Georgia Real Estate Schools in 2025
excerpt: Selecting the right online real estate school in Georgia is a pivotal step in your career journey. It’s essential to carefully evaluate your options and…
content:
Selecting the right online real estate school in Georgia is a pivotal step in your career journey. It’s essential to carefully evaluate your options and understand what each course provides. While there are many schools to choose from, only a few truly excel in delivering top-notch education and robust support to help you earn your real estate license.

At Smart Agent Alliance, we’re dedicated to helping new agents build successful careers. That’s why we’ve compiled a list of the top online real estate schools in Georgia. Our thorough review explores each school’s offerings, course delivery methods, and provides an unbiased assessment of the pros and cons of studying with each one.

  1. AceableAgent
  2. The CE Shop
  3. Colibri Real Estate
  4. RealEstateU
  5. 360 Training

AceableAgent

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A+
Top Feature: Ability to study on the go with the mobile app

Why We Chose It:

AceableAgent has quickly become a favorite among students due to its modern approach and flexibility. It is exclusively focused on real estate education, offering courses for every step of a real estate career, from pre-licensing to continuing education and career advancement. The courses are state-approved and designed to be accessible from any device, providing students with the flexibility to study anywhere.

Overview:

AceableAgent offers three pre-licensing packages, all of which include the required coursework. The courses are fully online and accessible via desktop, laptop, tablet, or smartphone. This accessibility is one of AceableAgent’s standout features, allowing students to study on the go. Courses are developed by experienced professionals and are accredited by ARELLO. Additionally, AceableAgent is known for its interactive coursework, which helps students grasp and retain information effectively.

Why AceableAgent is Great for Pre-Licensing:

AceableAgent’s pre-licensing courses are available in multiple states, ensuring they meet state-specific requirements. The courses include engaging video lectures, interactive content, and practice exams to help students prepare effectively for their licensing exams. AceableAgent offers a satisfaction guarantee and provides career resources to help new agents start their careers successfully.

User Experiences and Feedback:

Students have reported that AceableAgent’s courses are particularly user-friendly, with a modern interface that makes navigation easy. The mobile app is highly rated for its convenience, allowing users to study during commutes or breaks. The interactive content, including quizzes and video explanations, has been praised for making complex topics easier to understand. Additionally, AceableAgent’s customer service, though sometimes slow, is generally helpful and responsive to student needs.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $219
Basic Package Features: The AceableAgent 75-Hour Course offers comprehensive support, including instructor access via email, fully narrated lessons and a Lite Exam Prep with 1,000 unique practice questions. Additionally, a mini-course is provided to help you find the right sponsoring broker for your career.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, the upgraded packages offer The Virtual Instructor package includes 24/7 AI-powered support for accelerated learning, along with 3 months of PrepAgent state exam prep. This comprehensive package features premium study aids, including videos, audio lessons, flashcards, and over 1,660 practice questions. Additionally, it offers a real estate exam prep ebook, live tutoring, webinars, and live Q&A sessions with expert tutors.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $59
Basic Package Features: Thousands of practice questions; 100% money-back guarantee; 75+ real estate exam prep videos; online interactive flashcards; 100+ page exam prep ebook; hours of audio lessons; interactive vocabulary worksheet; 100s of hours of recorded webinars; live online webinars.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, the upgraded packages offer access to PrepAgent for 1 or 2 months, compared to just 1 week with the basic plan.

Post Licensing

Price Starts at: $149
Basic Package Features: The AceableAgent 25-Hour Course provides flexible learning with instructor support available via email, interactive lessons to keep you engaged, and a self-paced format that allows you to complete the course at your own speed.

Flexible Learning Options: Enjoy self-paced courses that fit your schedule.

Extended Course Access: Access course materials for up to six months from your enrollment date.

Risk-Free Enrollment: Benefit from a 30-day money-back guarantee if you’re not satisfied.

Exam Success Guarantee: Pass the licensing exam within three tries or receive a full course refund.

Comprehensive Exam Preparation: Gain access to a variety of study tools including prep videos, 75 audio lessons, digital flashcards, over 1600 practice questions, a 100-page exam prep ebook, weekly live webinars, live Q&A sessions with instructors, and the option for personalized 1-on-1 tutoring.

Dedicated Support: Instructor assistance is available seven days a week via email, and customer service can be reached by email and phone from Monday to Friday.

Convenient Final Exams: Utilize online proctoring services for the final exam across the nation, although California students do not need a proctor for their pre-licensing exam.

Mobile-Friendly Platform: Study anytime, anywhere with a course platform that is fully optimized for mobile devices.

Interactive Learning Tools: Engage with interactive content designed to enhance your learning experience and retention.

Career Resources: Access additional career support services to help you transition from student to professional agent successfully.

Pros:

  • Mobile app for studying
  • High pass rates among schools with 1,000+ students
  • Engaging and entertaining course materials
  • Exam prep through PrepAgent

Cons:

  • Course access lasts for 12 months
  • Some bugs reported in the mobile app
  • Limited technical support
  • Outsourced exam proctoring

To view their current pricing for pre-licensing click this linked button. If you are interested in any of the other courses they offer, you can find that through this link as well.

The CE Shop

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A
Top Feature: Course is easy to follow, high pass rates among students

Why We Chose It: The CE Shop offers a variety of real estate education options with an interactive and inquiry-based approach in their studying methods. While their focus is mainly on continuing education, they also provide excellent pre-licensing courses, exam prep, and post-licensing education. Their courses are accredited by ARELLO and have received numerous awards for their educational programs.

Overview: The CE Shop’s pre-licensing courses can be taken in 34 states, through four different course packages: Courses Only, Standard Package, Value Package, and Premium Package. Every package comes with business ebooks, career resources, downloadable resources, real estate glossary, digital flashcards, study schedules, and access to instructor-led webinars. Students have praised the course content for being easy to follow and highly informative, which has led to high pass rates.

Why The CE Shop is Great for Pre-Licensing: The CE Shop’s pre-licensing courses emphasize real-world applications with scenario-based learning. This approach helps students apply their knowledge to practical situations they will face in their real estate careers. Additionally, The CE Shop provides an exam prep edge program that offers additional practice tests and study aids to ensure students are well-prepared for their licensing exams.

User Experiences and Feedback: The CE Shop is well-regarded for its robust customer support and comprehensive resources. The ability to access instructor-led webinars provides an additional layer of support and interaction, which can be particularly beneficial for students who need more guidance. The frequent promotions and discounts make it a cost-effective option for many. Students appreciate the clear and structured study schedules, which help them stay on track and complete the course efficiently.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $206.50
Basic Package Features: This package offers the 75 hours of required instruction for eligibility to obtain a Georgia Real Estate Salesperson license. It prepares students for the state licensing exam and provides essential knowledge in areas like license law, agency law, real property ownership, finance, marketing, property management, and real estate calculations.
Upgrade Packages: The 75-Hr. GA Sales Pre-Licensing Premium Package, priced at $605, includes 87 total hours (75 mandatory and 12 elective) and covers everything needed to obtain a Georgia real estate license. This package offers the required 75-hour licensing course, Exam Prep Edge, the eTextbook “Real Estate Basics and Beyond,” access to additional practice exams, and the Learning Library. It also includes the ProPath Real Estate Career Kickstarter, featuring three professional development courses focused on business planning, lead generation, and negotiation skills.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $101.25
Basic Package Features: The GA Salesperson Exam Prep Edge, priced at $135, is an online study program designed to prepare you for the national and state portions of the Georgia real estate licensing exam. It features an initial assessment with feedback, dynamic practice exams with unique questions, and a real-time dashboard to track your progress and focus on areas needing improvement. This tool helps you effectively prepare to ace your exam and kickstart your real estate career.
Upgrade Packages: None

Post-Licensing

Price Starts at: $149
Basic Package Features: The Georgia Post-Licensing for Real Estate Salespersons course, priced at $145, provides 25 mandatory hours designed to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application in real estate. This course covers essential topics such as the listing process, property disclosures, buyer representation, purchase agreements, contracts, negotiation skills, the mortgage process, appraisals, ethical principles, and risk mitigation. It includes activities and scenarios to help you confidently apply what you’ve learned in real-world situations.
Upgrade Packages: Also includes the ProPath Real Estate Business Builder program enhances your real estate career with key professional development courses. It includes training on Pricing Strategies to help you effectively price homes and achieve sales goals, Tax Planning for the Self-Employed to manage finances and optimize tax savings, and Budget to Build Your Business, which guides you in estimating earnings, expenses, and creating a successful financial plan for your career.

License Renewal

Price Starts at: $145
Basic Package Features: The 27-Hr. GA CE First Renewal Package, priced at $145, provides the required 27 hours of continuing education (24 elective and 3 mandatory) for new licensees in Georgia. This package includes the necessary courses to complete the additional hours needed for the first license renewal, covering topics such as Georgia License Law, ethics, consumer protection, real estate finance, environmental awareness, personal safety, market analysis, and property inspections.
Upgrade Packages: In addition to the required CE courses, this package includes the ProPath Real Estate Business Builder program, offering nine hours of professional development in pricing strategies, tax planning for the self-employed, and budgeting for business success. These courses provide valuable knowledge but do not count toward CE credits.

Learning Format: Flexible, self-paced online courses.

Access Duration: Six months from the start date.

Money-Back Guarantee: Full refund within 30 days if less than 50% of the course is completed.

Pass Assurance: Exam cost reimbursed if you don’t pass on the first attempt.

Exam Preparation: Targeted review sessions, custom study plans, unlimited practice tests, and live webinars.

Support Services: Available daily via email, phone, or chat.

Final Exam Procedure: Online proctoring available nationwide; California exams are administered by the DRE at specific centers.

Extra Resources: Includes digital flashcards, a real estate glossary, a study schedule, business courses, and state-specific content.

Pros:

  • Multiple study package options and monthly payment plans
  • High pass rates among students
  • Interactive and easy-to-follow course material
  • Frequent discounts and promotions

Cons:

  • Mainly text-based study materials
  • Some students find the materials take longer to complete than expected
  • Limited coverage of real estate math

To view their current pricing for pre-licensing, first click this linked button, then under the main heading select “Real Estate” then fill in your State, Education, and License type (Your State, Pre-Licencing, Sales-Licencing)

Colibri Real Estate

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A
Top Feature: Affordable and comprehensive study materials

Why We Chose It: Colibri Real Estate is known for its affordability and thorough course materials. It provides excellent support to students preparing for their exams and offers a range of courses that cater to different learning needs. Colibri’s courses are designed to be clear and easy to understand, making them a great choice for budget-conscious students.

Overview: Colibri Real Estate offers various online courses with comprehensive study materials. The courses are designed to prepare students effectively for their licensing exams, with detailed support and resources. The pricing is competitive, making it an accessible option for many students.

Why Colibri Real Estate is Great for Pre-Licensing: Colibri Real Estate’ pre-licensing courses include interactive study tools such as flashcards, practice tests, and exam simulators. The courses are state-approved and designed to meet all the requirements for licensure. Colibri also offers a “pass or don’t pay” guarantee, ensuring students can retake the course if they don’t pass the exam on the first try. They also provide a career starter guide to help new agents transition smoothly into their real estate careers.

User Experiences and Feedback: Colibri Real Estate has a strong reputation for providing value for money. The comprehensive study materials are frequently updated to reflect the latest industry standards and practices. Students have noted that the detailed exam preparation support, including practice exams and study guides, is particularly helpful for passing the state licensing exams. The school’s customer support, though sometimes slow, is knowledgeable and helpful in resolving issues.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $179.40
Basic Package Features: The Pre-license Course includes a 75-hour state-approved pre-license course with instructor support, three real estate study guides, and accessible narrated audio with adjustable speeds. Additionally, it offers career support through Buffini & Company coaching videos, providing a comprehensive foundation for aspiring real estate professionals.
Upgrade Packages: The upgraded packages includes CompuCram Exam Prep, which offers simulated exams, flashcards, a readiness assessment, and audio review guides to prepare you thoroughly for your exams. It also features live and interactive instruction through the Exam Crammer Webinar Series and instructor Q&A sessions. Additionally, the Career Booster Pack provides one-year access to over 20 real estate “how-to” videos, job aids for new agents, buyer and seller checklists, and customizable action plan templates, ensuring you have the tools needed to succeed in your real estate career.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $69
Basic Package Features: CompuCram Exam Prep: Includes simulated exams, flashcards, a readiness assessment, and audio review guides to help you prepare effectively.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, they includes CompuCram Exam Prep with simulated exams, flashcards, readiness assessments, and audio review guides. It also offers live and interactive instruction through the Exam Crammer Webinar Series and Instructor Q&A. Additionally, a 45-hour post-license course with state-approved instructor support is included.

Post-Licensing

Price Starts at: $108
Basic Package Features: The Georgia Post-License Course is designed for newly licensed Georgia salespersons and provides the 25 mandatory hours required by the state for post-licensing. This self-paced online course allows you to complete the requirement on your own schedule, with support from expert local instructors available via email or phone. The package also includes a free 1-year RISMedia Premier Membership and accessible narrated audio with adjustable speeds, ensuring you can tailor your learning experience to your needs.
Upgrade Packages: None

License Renewal

Price Starts at: $129
Basic Package Features: The Georgia First-Time Renewal package, priced at $129, includes 27 hours of coursework (3 mandatory and 24 elective hours) designed to meet Georgia’s first-time renewal requirements. The courses are self-paced and accessible online, featuring narrated audio options for flexible learning. This package includes a mandatory course on Georgia Real Estate License Law, satisfying the three-hour license law requirement, and courses covering NAR Ethics, niche marketing, homebuyer education, eco-friendly homes, distressed properties, real estate safety, and working with real estate investors. It’s tailored for REALTORS® aiming to stay compliant while expanding their knowledge in specialized areas.
Upgrade Packages: None

Learning Options: Choose between self-paced online courses or live-streamed classes with real-time instructors for a classroom-like experience from home.

Course Access: Six months of access from the enrollment date.

Refund Policy: Full refund for self-paced courses if canceled within 30 days, and within 24 hours for live-stream courses.

Pass Guarantee: For packages with exam prep, Colibri will refund the course cost if you score 80% or higher on simulated exams but don’t pass the state exam on the first try.

Exam Preparation: Includes digital flashcards, mock exams, readiness assessments, audio review guides, live Q&A sessions, and six one-hour live webinars with instructors for focused preparation.

Instructor Support: Available by phone during business hours or via email for additional assistance.

Final Exam Process: Virtual proctoring available nationwide; in California, the DRE administers the exam at designated centers.

Additional Resources: Access to state-specific pre-licensing, continuing education, broker licensing, and mortgage licensing courses, as well as practice exams and a real estate dictionary.

Pros:

  • Affordable courses
  • Comprehensive study materials
  • Detailed exam preparation support

Cons:

  • Limited interactivity in course materials
  • Some students found customer support to be slow

To view their current pricing, click this linked button, then select your desired State, Education Selection, and Education Option Selection.

RealEstateU

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A-
Top Feature: Best affordable courses available

Why We Chose It: RealEstateU is known for its affordability and straightforward approach to real estate education. The audio-based courses are perfect for students who prefer to study on the go. The courses are designed to be simple yet effective, making them an excellent choice for budget-conscious students.

Overview: RealEstateU offers audio lectures that can be accessed on a computer, smartphone, or tablet. The courses are divided into chapters with related key terms, infographics, and quizzes to reinforce learning. Students can take the final exam online and receive a certificate of completion upon passing. The courses are highly affordable, often available at discounted rates.

Why RealEstateU is Great for Pre-Licensing: RealEstateU’s pre-licensing courses are tailored for various states, ensuring compliance with state-specific regulations. The audio-based format is ideal for students who prefer auditory learning, and the courses are designed to be flexible and convenient. RealEstateU also offers an online exam prep course to help students prepare for their licensing exam and includes a detailed course completion timeline to keep students on track.

User Experiences and Feedback: RealEstateU’s unique audio-based approach allows students to study hands-free, making it convenient for those with busy schedules. The courses are structured to be easy to follow, with clear explanations and relevant examples. Students appreciate the flexibility to listen to lectures while commuting or during other activities. The affordable pricing, coupled with frequent discounts, makes RealEstateU an attractive option for many.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $125
Basic Package Features: The 75-hour Georgia Real Estate License Course provides the state-required 75 hours of training through on-demand lessons that allow you to study at your own pace and on the go. It’s designed for self-motivated individuals, offering all the essentials needed to prepare for the Georgia real estate licensing exam.
Upgrade Packages: The upgraded 75-hour Georgia Real Estate License Course provides state-required training with on-demand lessons. It includes a State Exam Study Guide to reduce study time, an e-Textbook for offline access, and a 10-part course on starting a successful real estate career. Additional resources include the “Agent Success Path” for client growth and a “Blueprint to Making $245,415/year” to help new agents start earning quickly.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $79
Basic Package Features: RealEstateU’s Georgia Real Estate Practice Test package includes a study guide and three practice exams to help you pass the GA Licensing Exam. This prep course and practice questions are designed to reduce study time by up to 90%.
Upgrade Packages: None

Learning Formats: RealEstateU offers self-paced online courses with audio lessons and downloadable materials to help you learn at your own convenience. The courses are accessible on any device, making it easy to study anytime, anywhere.

Course Access: Courses are available for 12 months from the date of enrollment, giving you ample time to complete your studies.

Refund Policy: They offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you complete less than 50% of the course and are not satisfied, you can request a refund within this period.

Exam Preparation: The courses include state exam study guides, sample questions, practice exams, and an “Agent Success Course” to help you prepare thoroughly for the licensing exam.

Student Support: 24/7 customer support is available via email to assist with any questions or issues.

Additional Resources: Infographic materials, e-textbooks, and detailed lesson outlines to enhance learning. They also offer specialized real estate investment courses covering topics like real estate accounting, syndication, and off-market transactions.

Pros:

  • Affordable prices and frequent discounts
  • Flexibility to study on the go with audio courses
  • 30-day money-back guarantee

Cons:

  • Study materials may not be as in-depth
  • No live instructor support
  • Limited additional study materials

To view their current pricing for pre-licensing, first click this linked button, then click “Real Estate License” and fill in your state and the type of real estate education you are looking for (Your State,  Get Your License)

360 Training

SmartAgentAlliance Score: B-
Top Feature: Budget-friendly with flexible study options

Why We Chose It: 360 Training Real Estate School offers affordable pricing and comprehensive content, making it an attractive option for students on a budget. The courses are designed to be straightforward and easy to understand, providing a solid foundation for exam preparation.

Overview: 360 Training offers basic and premium course packages, both of which are fully online and can be accessed anytime. The courses are text-based and come with customer support available seven days a week. While the materials are simple and easy to understand, some students have reported issues with the software and customer service.

Why 360 Training is Great for Pre-Licensing: 360 Training’s pre-licensing courses are available for various states and include all necessary coursework to meet state requirements. The courses are structured to be self-paced, allowing students to complete them on their own schedule. Additionally, 360 Training provides exam prep courses and practice tests to help students prepare for the state licensing exam. They also offer a study planner tool to help students organize their study schedule effectively.

User Experiences and Feedback: 360 Training Real Estate School is noted for its budget-friendly pricing and straightforward course design. The self-paced format is particularly beneficial for students who need flexibility in their study schedules. The text-based materials, while simple, are comprehensive and cover all necessary topics for the licensing exams. The school also offers ongoing customer support to assist students throughout their course.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $165
Basic Package Features: The Georgia Real Estate Commission requires 75 hours of pre-license education from an approved provider. This Basic Package includes the required coursework and a free real estate math course for extra practice. After completing the course, you’ll need to pass a proctored final exam with at least a 75% score, after which you’ll receive a certificate and have your credits reported to GREC. For added exam preparation and a money-back guarantee, consider upgrading to the Premium Package, which includes an Exam Prep course.
Upgrade Packages: The Prelicense Package meets Georgia’s 75-hour pre-license training requirement and prepares you for the state licensing exam with practice tests. It includes the mandatory pre-license course, a complete exam prep course, a free real estate math course, and a bonus class in client communications. Upon completion, you’ll receive a Certificate of Completion, ensuring you’re fully equipped to start your real estate career in Georgia.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $79
Basic Package Features: The Premium Georgia Real Estate Salesperson Exam Prep course helps you prepare for the National and State portions of the Georgia Salesman License Exam. It includes condensed study guides, thousands of practice questions, and customizable practice exams. Each exam provides question-by-question feedback, helping you identify areas that need more focus. While not an official testing mechanism, this module is designed to boost your readiness for the official exam. To maximize its benefits, complete the required pre-license coursework first. You can bundle this with the Georgia Premium Pre-License package to save.
Upgrade Packages: None

Continuing Education

Price Starts at: $60
Basic Package Features: Includes 20 hours of coursework covering Georgia Agency, Code of Ethics, Trust Funds, Fair Housing, Risk Management, Brokerage Administration and Management, and Implicit Bias Training. It also features at least 18 hours on Consumer Protection topics and 7 hours on Consumer Protection or Consumer Service.
Upgrade Packages: None

Post-Licensing

Price Starts at: $99
Basic Package Features: The 25-Hour Georgia Post-License course, approved by the Georgia Real Estate Commission (GREC), is designed to help you start your real estate career with a strong foundation. This course covers essential topics such as business planning, effective communication, and the mindset of successful agents. It also includes Georgia’s Residential Mortgage Fraud law. After completing the course, you’ll need to pass a proctored final exam, with your credits submitted to GREC to avoid any lapse in your license. Completing this course within your first year also counts toward nine hours of continuing education for your first renewal.
Upgrade Packages: None

Learning Formats: 360Training offers self-paced online courses that can be accessed 24/7 from any device. The courses are designed to be engaging with a mix of text, videos, images, and quizzes to enhance understanding and retention?.

Course Access: Students have access to their courses for a full year, providing ample time to complete the material at their own pace?.

Refund Policy: 360Training offers a 72-hour refund policy, allowing students to cancel their purchase and receive a full refund within this period if they are not satisfied?.

Exam Preparation: The platform includes exam prep materials such as practice exams, a real estate math course, and study guides to help students prepare effectively for their licensing exams. Additionally, they offer proctored final exams for states that require it? ?.

Student Support: Customer support is available seven days a week via live chat and toll-free phone calls to assist students with any issues they might encounter.

Additional Resources: The platform provides a wide range of elective courses for continuing education (CE), covering topics such as tax-favorable real estate transactions and client-focused communications. These courses are available in 32 states?.

Pros:

  • Affordable course options
  • Flexibility to study at your own pace
  • Customer support available seven days a week

Cons:

  • Strictly text-based materials
  • Reports of software and customer service issues

Our Review Process:

At SmartAgentAlliance, our goal is to provide accurate and helpful reviews of online real estate schools to assist prospective real estate agents in making informed decisions. Our review process involves several key steps:

Research and Data Collection:

We begin by gathering comprehensive information about each real estate school, including course offerings, pricing, accreditation, and user reviews. This involves visiting the schools’ websites, reading third-party reviews, and gathering feedback from current and former students.

Evaluation Criteria:

Our evaluation is based on several important criteria, including:

  • Course Quality: We assess the content and structure of the courses to ensure they cover all necessary topics comprehensively and are easy to follow.
  • Accessibility: We evaluate the flexibility and accessibility of the courses, including the availability of mobile apps and study materials.
  • Pass Rates: We consider the pass rates of students who have completed the courses and taken the licensing exam.
  • Student Support: We look at the level of support provided to students, including access to instructors, customer service, and additional resources like study guides and practice exams.
  • Pricing: We compare the cost of the courses relative to the value they offer, including any discounts or payment plans available.
  • User Feedback: We gather and analyze feedback from students who have taken the courses to get an understanding of their experiences and satisfaction levels.

Scoring and Ranking:

Each school is scored based on the evaluation criteria, and an overall score is calculated. The scores are then used to rank the schools, with additional considerations given to standout features that may set a school apart from the rest.

AceableAgent, The CE Shop, Colibri Real Estate School, RealEstateU, and 360 Training.

Georgia pre-license courses include the mandatory 75 hours of training required by the Georgia Real Estate Commission (GREC) to prepare for the state licensing exam. The courses cover key topics such as real estate principles, property ownership, finance, contracts, agency law, and Georgia-specific regulations. Many packages also offer additional resources like exam prep, study guides, practice tests, and client communication skills. Upon completion, you’ll receive a certificate of completion, qualifying you to take the Georgia real estate licensing exam.

To choose the best online real estate school in Georgia, ensure it’s GREC-approved, offers comprehensive and up-to-date course content, and provides flexible, self-paced learning. Check for instructor support, high pass rates, and positive student reviews. Additional resources like exam prep and career support are also valuable.

Yes, most online real estate courses are self-paced, allowing you to study at your own convenience. This flexibility is ideal for students who need to balance their studies with work or other commitments.

Support varies by school but generally includes access to instructors via email or chat, customer service support, and sometimes live webinars or Q&A sessions.

The cost of online real estate courses varies by school and package. Basic pre-license courses can start around $100, while comprehensive packages with additional features like exam prep and career support can cost several hundred dollars.

Most online real estate schools offer a refund policy, typically within a certain period (e.g., 30 days) if you haven’t completed a significant portion of the course. Check the specific refund policy of the school you choose.

Yes, reputable online real estate schools offer student support through various channels such as email, phone, and live chat. Some also provide instructor-led webinars and Q&A sessions.

At Smart Agent Alliance, we prioritize organization, clarity, and efficiency to help our agents succeed. We provide essential onboarding resources, customizable presentations, business automations, client checklists, business assets, social media content, YouTube support, a growth plan, quality lead generation, production know-how, website support, and top-notch organizational tools.

The Wolf Pack team at eXp Realty offers expert-led courses like Social Agent Academy 3.0, the Wolf Pack Hub, and the Investor Army for property flipping. We provide tailored assistance for new agents, developing agents, top producers, team leaders, and broker owners. Key resources include lead generation, production know-how, social media content, and YouTube support.

content:
Key Points

  • Cash Offers for Sellers: Agents provide sellers instant cash offers from investors (including Opendoor) via eXp’s platform.
  • Double Commissions: Earn fees on the initial sale and when the iBuyer resells the home.
  • Multiple Offers: Sellers receive/compare competitive bids from multiple investors at once.
  • Flexible Home Criteria: Works for luxury homes, rentals, or properties needing repairs—unlike most iBuyers.
  • Opendoor Integration: Access Opendoor’s offers directly within eXp’s platform for faster deals.
  • Quick Certification: Agents complete a short course to use ExpressOffers (required for access).

You know that seller—the one who ghosted you after saying, “We just want something easy, like Opendoor”? Yeah. That one. It used to sting, watching your listing walk out the door while you walked away with nothing.

But not anymore.

Thanks to ExpressOffers, eXp agents can now give sellers what they want: quick, convenient cash offers for houses, including one from Opendoor—without sacrificing your commission or your sanity. Even better? You’re still their agent, start to finish. You get paid. You stay in the driver’s seat. And your client avoids the chaos of showings, repairs, and financing drama.

It’s like someone finally built an iBuyer model that doesn’t screw over agents. Imagine that. Want in? You should. Because this isn’t just a cool perk—it’s a full-blown listing magnet. Here’s your handy-dandy index:

Understanding iBuying

eXp Realty iBuyer Better for Agents

Why eXp Realty Cash Offers Are Better for Home Sellers

Understanding iBuying

iBuyer Basics

Alright, you likely know the drill. But let’s recap. iBuyers are companies that use technology to make quick offers on homes, buying directly from home sellers.

Unlike the traditional route where sellers list their homes and wait for buyers, iBuyers speed up the process by using data to determine a home’s value and making fast, all-cash offers.

Home Seller Benefits

One major advantage of using iBuyers is speed. Sellers don’t have to wait long to offload their property.

Another perk is convenience – no hassle of open houses, showings, repairs, or waiting for buyer financing approvals.

Home sellers also have the flexibility to choose their closing date, which is perfect if they need to move on a specific date.

IBuyer Home Types

Large corporate iBuyers typically look for specific types of homes. They most often target houses in selling areas with lots of similar homes – think planned neighborhoods or “tract” homes. There, recent home sales go a long way to coming up with predictable prices.

Additionally, most large iBuyers want homes that are in decent condition. Contrary to popular belief, most iBuyers are not in the business of “flipping” homes. They don’t mind doing some quick cosmetic changes, but their goal is to turn around and sell the home for a profit relatively quickly.

Corporate iBuyers also tend to avoid homes on the luxury end of the market preferring a market that attracts both more home buyers and sellers.

What is ExpressOffers?

eXp Realty iBuyer program is called ExpressOffers. Similar to large corporate iBuyers, ExpressOffers provides quick cash offers for home sellers. However, ExpressOffers stands out by offering unique benefits for home sellers and you, making it by far a superior choice.

eXp Realty iBuyer Better for Agents

Agents Get Paid for the Original Sale

Unlike large iBuyers, where agents are typically left out of the transaction, eXp Realty’s ExpressOffers allows agents to earn a commission, one that they negotiate directly with the seller. This means you still get paid even if your client opts for a quick cash sale.

Agents Get Paid for the Next Sale

It gets even better. When the eXp Realty iBuyer eventually goes to list the home, the listing goes back to the original eXp Realty agent. It’s like double-dipping, but your double commission comes from two home sales with a bit of time in between.

Why eXp Realty Cash Offers Are Better for Home Sellers

When it comes to cash offers for houses, eXp Realty gives sellers more options—and more control. With ExpressOffers, your clients aren’t limited to just one investor or offer. Instead, they can tap into a network of serious buyers, compare offers, and pick what works best for them.

And now? eXp just leveled up.

Thanks to a new partnership with Opendoor, the largest iBuyer in the U.S., your sellers can now get a legit Opendoor cash offer directly through the ExpressOffers platform. That’s right. The same Opendoor they’re Googling at midnight? You can now offer that, with full agent support (and your commission intact).

But wait, there’s more:

  • More Property Types Accepted
    ExpressOffers doesn’t stop at cookie-cutter homes. We’re talking luxury listings, rentals, fixer-uppers, and properties that corporate iBuyers normally ghost. If it has a roof, there’s a good chance ExpressOffers has a buyer.
  • Multiple Offers, One Simple App
    Your clients fill out a single application through you, and ExpressOffers gets to work. In return, they receive multiple competitive cash offers—all in one place. Side-by-side comparisons? Check. No pressure? Also check.

So yeah, when you can offer cash offers for houses from Opendoor and beyond, you’re not just helping your sellers—you’re making yourself the obvious choice.

eXp Realty iBuyer Agent Perks

Besides earning a commission for an iBuyer cash offer, there are other benefits for agents.

More Listing Appointments

Being able to offer home sellers a competitive cash offer means more listing appointments for eXp agents for two reasons.

First, you can earn more listing appointments by offering the possibility of cash offers. Second, ExpressOffers provides leads from its lead generation efforts to eXp agents.

Cash Sale Reality

Another agent perk is that odds are that your iBuyer listing appointment will result in you getting another traditional listing. In fact, about 90% of the time, home sellers decide against a cash sale once they understand the iBuyer reality.

That is, because iBuyers are in the business for profit, they don’t offer the maximum value for a home. You can show the home seller offers from iBuyers and then explain that the seller is likely leaving money on the table with the cash offer. That is a deal-breaker for many sellers.

This honest, upfront approach often earns the agent the listing instead. It’s a strategic way to convert a cash-offer lead into a traditional listing.

Thus, the partnership between ExpressOffers and eXp Realty benefits both home sellers and agents. Sellers receive expert guidance on their best options, while agents gain access to a broader range of potential listings and clients. It’s a win-win situation that enhances your ability to secure more listings and provide sellers with comprehensive support.

How ExpressOffers Works

ExpressOffers is the team and technology behind eXp Realty iBuyers. The technology organizes and standardizes a plethora of iBuyers standing ready to make cash offers.

ExpressOffers Application

The process is straightforward. eXp agents upload details about a home to the ExpressOffers platform. eXp agents can immediately see which iBuyers might be interested in purchasing the property.

Next, the eXp agent gathers more home details for the potential investors. iBuyers review the information and may ask for more details or photos. Sellers don’t have to do anything during this time.

ExpressOffers Cash Offers

Then, voila, home sellers can receive multiple cash offers from interested investors. Sellers can see all offers side-by-side. They compare them without pressure.

ExpressOffers Decision Time

Sellers have time to think over the offers. They decide what’s best for them. They can accept an offer, reject an offer, or ask for changes. There’s no obligation to accept any offer.

ExpressOffers Closing Process

If a home seller accepts an offer, the closing process begins. As usual, you help with the paperwork and deadlines. Closings usually happen much faster than traditional sales. Your sellers can sometimes have their cash in hand within two weeks after accepting an offer.

Agent Support

Throughout this process, eXp Realty agents provide support. They answer questions and give advice based on experience. eXp agents make sure sellers understand each step. They help sellers feel confident in their decisions.

Opendoor Integration Benefits for eXp Agents

This exciting development more than enhances ExpressOffers services. This redefines the real estate transaction experience.

Efficient Transactions

Opendoor’s innovative approach to real estate transactions, combined with our ExpressOffers platform, offers agents a streamlined and efficient way to connect sellers with instant offers.

You can get quickly get Opendoor offers right from the ExpressOffers platform making the process simple and effective.

Continuous Support and Innovation

As part of this integration, eXp Realty is committed to providing ongoing improvements, training, and technology updates to make agent transactions as smooth as possible.

eXp Realty iBuyer Agent Requirements

To receive ExpressOffer leads and seek eXp Realty iBuyer offers, including Opendoor offers, you must be ExpressOffers certified. All eXp agents are qualified to seek ExpressOffers certification.

The certification is critical as it familiarizes you with the distinct workflow within the ExpressOffers platform, including the essential disclosure agreements to sellers. But, no worries, it’s easy to get certified. Just sign up for an on-demand ExpressOffers course, pass some quizzes and you’ll be ExpressOffers certified in a jif.

The Smartest Way to Offer Cash Offers for Houses

In a world where sellers crave speed and convenience, eXp Realty gives agents the tools to deliver just that—without getting cut out of the deal. With ExpressOffers, you can offer your clients multiple cash offers for houses, including one from Opendoor, the biggest name in iBuying. The difference? You stay in control. You keep your commission. And your clients get a smooth, stress-free experience backed by real expertise.

It’s a win for sellers, a win for agents, and a serious power move in a competitive market. Now, imagine stacking that with next-level support.

That is, when you combine this with the added value of joining eXp and naming a sponsor like Smart Agent Alliance, you’re getting a rocket ship.

Smart Agent Alliance runs meetings so you gain passive income. How awesome is that? It’s like free money.  Smart Agent Alliance also gives agents access to:

  • A done-for-you and hosted real estate attraction website
  • Social Agent Academy Pro ($10,500 value) for social media marketing
  • Weekly coaching sessions with top producers
  • Customizable lead funnels, email campaigns, and marketing templates
  • And more…

All free for agents who join through the Smart Agent Alliance sponsor line. Learn more about how eXp Realty and Smart Agent Alliance can help you scale your career. Not sure if eXp is the right fit for you? Take this quick quiz to find out if eXp is a good match, especially if support and systems matter to you.

Not sure how passive income grows?  You can play with the numbers using our exp realty revenue share calculator to see how much you could earn. Not sure how to become a real estate agent? We’ve got loads of helpful info on that too.

Frequently Asked Questions

What is an iBuyer?

iBuyers are companies that use technology to make quick offers on homes, buying directly from home sellers. Unlike the traditional route where sellers list their homes and wait for buyers, iBuyers speed up the process by using data to determine a home’s value and making fast all-cash offers.

What are the home seller advantages of iBuyer offers?

Besides getting cash for their property, another major advantage of iBuyers is speed. Sellers don’t have to wait long to offload their property. Another perk is convenience – no hassle of open houses, showings, repairs, or waiting for buyer financing approvals. Home sellers also have the flexibility to choose their closing date, which is perfect if they need to move on a specific date.

What home types do iBuyer want?

Large corporate iBuyers most often target houses in selling areas with lots of similar homes where recent home sales go a long way to coming up with predictable prices. Additionally, most large iBuyers want homes that are in decent condition. They don’t mind doing some quick cosmetic changes, but their goal is to turn around and sell the home for a profit relatively quickly. Corporate iBuyers also tend to avoid homes on the luxury end of the market preferring a market that attracts both more home buyers and sellers.

What is ExpressOffers?

eXp Realty iBuyer program is called ExpressOffers. ExpressOffers provides up to multiple quick cash offers for home sellers.

Why is eXp Realty iBuyer program great for agents?

eXp Realty’s ExpressOffers allows agents to earn a commission. Also, when the eXp Realty iBuyer eventually goes to list the home, the listing goes back to the original eXp Realty agent.

Why is eXp Realty iBuyer program better for home sellers?

ExpressOffers buys the same home types that large iBuyers buy plus they also purchase high-end luxury homes, rental homes, and homes that need more than some simple cosmetic changes to garner the full value. Additionally, the ExpressOffers platform can result in multiple offers that sellers can compare side by side.

What are eXp Realty iBuyer agent benefits?

Besides earning a commission for an iBuyer cash offer, offering home sellers a cash offer means more listing appointments because it’s easier to get the listing appointment and because ExpressOffers provides leads from its lead generation. Also, most home sellers opt for a traditional listing once they understand the realities of iBuyers.

Can eXp agents give clients an Opendoor offer?

Yes! The ExpressOffers platform is integrated with Opendoor, currently the largest U.S. iBuying company.

What are the eXp Realty iBuyer agent requirements?

To receive ExpressOffer leads and seek eXp Realty iBuyer offers, including Opendoor offers, agents must be ExpressOffers certified. All eXp agents are qualified to seek ExpressOffers certification. It’s easy to get certified. Just sign up for an on-demand ExpressOffers course and pass some quizzes.

title: Best Online Colorado Real Estate Schools 2025
excerpt: Selecting the right online real estate school in Colorado is a critical step in your journey toward a successful career. It’s essential to carefully evaluate…
content:
Selecting the right online real estate school in Colorado is a critical step in your journey toward a successful career. It’s essential to carefully evaluate your options and understand the unique benefits each course provides. With numerous real estate schools out there, only a handful truly excel in offering top-notch education and thorough support to help you earn your real estate license.

At Smart Agent Alliance, we are dedicated to helping aspiring agents kickstart their careers on the right foot. To support you in this endeavor, we’ve compiled a list of the top online real estate schools in Colorado. Our comprehensive review highlights what each school offers, the different ways courses are delivered, and a fair assessment of the pros and cons associated with each option.

  1. The CE Shop
  2. Colibri Real Estate
  3. Colorado Real Estate School
  4. Kaplan

The CE Shop

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A
Top Feature: Course is easy to follow, high pass rates among students

Why We Chose It: The CE Shop offers a variety of real estate education options with an interactive and inquiry-based approach in their studying methods. While their focus is mainly on continuing education, they also provide excellent pre-licensing courses, exam prep, and post-licensing education. Their courses are accredited by ARELLO and have received numerous awards for their educational programs.

Overview: The CE Shop’s pre-licensing courses can be taken in 34 states, through four different course packages: Courses Only, Standard Package, Value Package, and Premium Package. Every package comes with business ebooks, career resources, downloadable resources, real estate glossary, digital flashcards, study schedules, and access to instructor-led webinars. Students have praised the course content for being easy to follow and highly informative, which has led to high pass rates.

Why The CE Shop is Great for Pre-Licensing: The CE Shop’s pre-licensing courses emphasize real-world applications with scenario-based learning. This approach helps students apply their knowledge to practical situations they will face in their real estate careers. Additionally, The CE Shop provides an exam prep edge program that offers additional practice tests and study aids to ensure students are well-prepared for their licensing exams.

User Experiences and Feedback: The CE Shop is well-regarded for its robust customer support and comprehensive resources. The ability to access instructor-led webinars provides an additional layer of support and interaction, which can be particularly beneficial for students who need more guidance. The frequent promotions and discounts make it a cost-effective option for many. Students appreciate the clear and structured study schedules, which help them stay on track and complete the course efficiently.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $495
Basic Package Features: This 168-hour package includes six courses required for a Colorado Real Estate Broker License and Exam Prep Edge, preparing learners for the state exam and a successful career. The courses cover contracts, law, closings, legal issues, record keeping, and practical applications.
Upgrade Packages: These packages also includes the ProPath Real Estate Career Kickstarter program, featuring three focused courses. You’ll create a 30/60/90-day business plan, set SMART goals, and integrate strategies. Additionally, you’ll learn lead generation and negotiation skills, each in a 3-hour course.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $101.25
Basic Package Features: This program covers both the national and state portions of the Colorado Broker licensing exam. Exam Prep Edge offers an intuitive online study experience with initial assessments, dynamic practice exams, and real-time dashboards to focus your study efforts on areas needing improvement.
Upgrade Packages: None, however the other 2 courses offer the same conntents of the main packed, but splpit between a state spesific course and a nantional spesific course.

Continuing Education

Price Starts at: $145
Basic Package Features: This package offers 12 elective CE hours and includes the required 2024 Colorado Annual Commission Update course for active Broker license renewals. Courses cover ethics, environmental awareness, consumer protection, and business planning.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, This package also includes the ProPath Real Estate Business Builder program, with 9 hours of professional development. Courses cover pricing strategies, tax planning, and business budgeting. Note: These do not qualify for CE credits and are additional to the mandatory and elective hours.

Learning Format: Flexible, self-paced online courses.

Access Duration: Six months from the start date.

Money-Back Guarantee: Full refund within 30 days if less than 50% of the course is completed.

Pass Assurance: Exam cost reimbursed if you don’t pass on the first attempt.

Exam Preparation: Targeted review sessions, custom study plans, unlimited practice tests, and live webinars.

Support Services: Available daily via email, phone, or chat.

Final Exam Procedure: Online proctoring available nationwide; California exams are administered by the DRE at specific centers.

Extra Resources: Includes digital flashcards, a real estate glossary, a study schedule, business courses, and state-specific content.

Pros:

  • Multiple study package options and monthly payment plans
  • High pass rates among students
    Interactive and easy-to-follow course material
  • Frequent discounts and promotions

Cons:

  • Mainly text-based study materials
  • Some students find the materials take longer to complete than expected
  • Limited coverage of real estate math

To view their current pricing for pre-licensing, first click this linked button, then under the main heading select “Real Estate” then fill in your State, Education, and License type (Your State, Pre-Licencing, Sales-Licencing)

Colibri Real Estate

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A
Top Feature: Affordable and comprehensive study materials

Why We Chose It: Colibri Real Estate is known for its affordability and thorough course materials. It provides excellent support to students preparing for their exams and offers a range of courses that cater to different learning needs. Colibri’s courses are designed to be clear and easy to understand, making them a great choice for budget-conscious students.

Overview: Colibri Real Estate offers various online courses with comprehensive study materials. The courses are designed to prepare students effectively for their licensing exams, with detailed support and resources. The pricing is competitive, making it an accessible option for many students.

Why Colibri Real Estate is Great for Pre-Licensing: Colibri Real Estate’ pre-licensing courses include interactive study tools such as flashcards, practice tests, and exam simulators. The courses are state-approved and designed to meet all the requirements for licensure. Colibri also offers a “pass or don’t pay” guarantee, ensuring students can retake the course if they don’t pass the exam on the first try. They also provide a career starter guide to help new agents transition smoothly into their real estate careers.

User Experiences and Feedback: Colibri Real Estate has a strong reputation for providing value for money. The comprehensive study materials are frequently updated to reflect the latest industry standards and practices. Students have noted that the detailed exam preparation support, including practice exams and study guides, is particularly helpful for passing the state licensing exams. The school’s customer support, though sometimes slow, is knowledgeable and helpful in resolving issues.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $239.40
Basic Package Features:  The 168-hour pre-license course includes state-approved instructor support, three real estate study guides, and narrated audio with adjustable speeds. Additionally, it provides career support through Buffini & Company coaching videos.
Upgrade Packages:  Yes. The packages includes CompuCram Exam Prep, featuring simulated exams, flashcards, readiness assessments, and audio review guides. Additionally, it offers live and interactive instruction through an Exam Crammer Webinar Series and Instructor Q&A sessions. The Career Booster Pack provides one-year access to over 20 real estate “how-to” videos, job aids for new agents, buyer and seller checklists, and customizable action plan templates.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $69
Basic Package Features: CompuCram Exam Prep: Includes simulated exams, flashcards, a readiness assessment, and audio review guides to help you prepare effectively.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, Includes Live & Interactive Instruction which includes an exam crammer webinar series and instructor Q&A. Also includes the Post-License Course which offers a 90-hour program with state-approved instructor support.

Continuing Education

Price Starts at: $89
Basic Package Features:  This package offers 8 hours of continuing education, including 4 mandatory core hours and 4 elective hours, all designed for the 2024 cycle. Courses are accessible online at your own pace, with narrated audio that includes adjustable speeds.
Upgrade Packages: None

Learning Options: Choose between self-paced online courses or live-streamed classes with real-time instructors for a classroom-like experience from home.

Course Access: Six months of access from the enrollment date.

Refund Policy: Full refund for self-paced courses if canceled within 30 days, and within 24 hours for live-stream courses.

Pass Guarantee: For packages with exam prep, Colibri will refund the course cost if you score 80% or higher on simulated exams but don’t pass the state exam on the first try.

Exam Preparation: Includes digital flashcards, mock exams, readiness assessments, audio review guides, live Q&A sessions, and six one-hour live webinars with instructors for focused preparation.

Instructor Support: Available by phone during business hours or via email for additional assistance.

Final Exam Process: Virtual proctoring available nationwide; in California, the DRE administers the exam at designated centers.

Additional Resources: Access to state-specific pre-licensing, continuing education, broker licensing, and mortgage licensing courses, as well as practice exams and a real estate dictionary.

Pros:

  • Affordable courses
  • Comprehensive study materials
  • Detailed exam preparation support

Cons:

  • Limited interactivity in course materials
  • Some students found customer support to be slow

To view their current pricing, click this linked button, then select your desired State, Education Selection, and Education Option Selection.

Colorado Real Estate School

SmartAgentAlliance Score: A-
Top Feature: Best state-specific course

Why We Chose It: Colorado Real Estate School stands out for its comprehensive and accessible approach to real estate education in Colorado. With a focus on delivering high-quality content through various formats, including video and interactive lessons, it caters to different learning styles. The courses are designed to be thorough yet user-friendly, making them a top choice for students aiming for a successful real estate career in Colorado.

Overview: Colorado Real Estate School offers courses that can be accessed on a computer, smartphone, or tablet, providing flexibility for students to study at their own pace. The curriculum is divided into modules with relevant key terms, visual aids, and quizzes to reinforce understanding. Students can take the final exam online and receive a certificate of completion upon passing. The school offers competitive pricing, with various package options to suit different budgets.

Why RealEstateU is Great for Pre-Licensing:  The pre-licensing courses at Colorado Real Estate School are specifically tailored to meet the requirements of the Colorado Division of Real Estate. The school’s interactive format is ideal for students who benefit from visual and hands-on learning. Additionally, Colorado Real Estate School provides an online exam prep course to help students confidently prepare for their licensing exam. The structured course timeline ensures students stay on track and complete their education efficiently.

User Experiences and Feedback: Colorado Real Estate School’s diverse learning formats allow students to choose the method that best suits their lifestyle, whether it’s through interactive videos, reading materials, or quizzes. The courses are designed to be engaging and easy to follow, with practical examples relevant to the Colorado real estate market. Students appreciate the school’s flexible scheduling and the support provided by experienced instructors. The reasonable pricing and the value offered in terms of content and preparation make Colorado Real Estate School a popular choice among aspiring real estate agents in the state.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $399
Basic Package Features: The Colorado Real Estate School offers a 168-hour streaming video course required for a real estate license, featuring licensed brokers as instructors. The program is self-paced, with a TruSupport Pass Guarantee, ensuring support until you pass the exam. It includes fast response email support, an extensive exam prep toolkit, a library of practice questions, and unlimited reviews of videos and exams. Additional resources include a real estate math tool, digital flashcards, and post-education support for career guidance. A payment plan is available, and a downloadable national real estate reference manual is included, with an optional hardcopy.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, The Enhanced package, priced at $499, includes all the features of the Standard package, plus additional support. It offers live instructor phone support, weekly daytime and evening Q&A webinars, and an optional weekly exam cram workshop with an instructor. The Deluxe package, at $599, adds career-focused webinars, including “Joining the Right Brokerage,” “Managing Buyers,” and “Managing Sellers.” It also includes a 30-day course extension if needed.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $149
Basic Package Features: The comprehensive State and National Exam Prep Systems bundle is designed to help you prepare for both sides of the license exam. The package includes the Insider’s Guide Prep System with practice exams, assessments, instructional videos, exam outlines, digital flashcards, and test tips. It also features the Math Made Easy interactive teaching tool and access to weekly live instructor Q&A webinars, allowing you to assess your knowledge and strengthen any weak areas.
Upgrade Packages: None, however if you only need help with national or state spesific sections there are options to buy the exam prep for them separately.

Continuing Education

Agents must complete 24 credit hours of continuing education every three years: 12 elective hours and 12 hours from the Annual Commission Update (ACU), a four-hour course required yearly.

Price Starts at: $24
Basic Package Features: There are no packages offered. However, there are a vast number of courses here. These include, Annual Commission Update, Redline Contracts and NAR Settlement, Redline Contract and Legal Updates, Corresponding Forms to the CREC Contracts, Don’t Let Solar Panels Eclipse Transactions, Blockchain & Cryptocurrency in Real Estate, Bankruptcy and Real Estate, and a bunch more, all of which are able to go towards that needed 24 credit hours.

Learning Formats: Colorado Real Estate School offers self-paced online courses with a mix of video lessons, interactive content, and downloadable materials, allowing you to learn at your own convenience. The courses are accessible on any device, ensuring you can study anytime, anywhere.

Course Access: Courses are available for 12 months from the date of enrollment, giving you plenty of time to complete your studies and prepare for the licensing exam.

Refund Policy: Colorado Real Estate School provides a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you complete less than 50% of the course and are not satisfied, you can request a refund within this period.

Exam Preparation: The courses include Colorado-specific exam study guides, sample questions, practice exams, and additional resources to help you thoroughly prepare for the state licensing exam.

Student Support: Colorado Real Estate School offers customer support through email to assist with any questions or issues you may encounter during your course.

Additional Resources: The school provides a variety of supplemental learning materials, including infographics, e-textbooks, and detailed lesson outlines. They also offer specialized real estate investment courses covering topics such as real estate accounting and investment strategies tailored to the Colorado market.

Pros:

  • Tailored courses specifically for Colorado’s real estate market
  • Interactive learning formats with videos and quizzes
  • 12-month access to courses for flexible completion
  • Exam prep resources tailored to Colorado’s licensing requirements

Cons:

  • Limited live instructor support
  • May require self-discipline due to self-paced format
  • Fewer advanced topics in real estate investment

To view their current pricing for pre-licensing, first click this linked button, then click “Real Estate License” and fill in your state and the type of real estate education you are looking for (Your State,  Get Your License)

Kaplan

SmartAgentAlliance Score: B-
Top Feature: Decent, but not recommended over other options 

Why We Chose It: Kaplan Real Estate Education is renowned for its comprehensive and well-structured courses, designed to provide students with a deep understanding of real estate principles. The courses offer a blend of traditional and interactive learning, making them a top choice for students who want a thorough and engaging educational experience.

Overview: Kaplan Real Estate Education provides a variety of learning formats, including live online classes, on-demand video courses, and traditional textbooks. These courses are organized into modules that cover essential real estate concepts, complete with practice quizzes and interactive activities to enhance retention. Students can access their courses on multiple devices, and Kaplan offers a robust exam prep program to ensure students are ready for their licensing exams.

Why 360 Training is Great for Pre-Licensing: Kaplan’s pre-licensing courses are meticulously crafted to meet state-specific requirements, ensuring that students are well-prepared for their licensing exams. The flexibility of learning formats, whether through live classes or self-paced video lessons, allows students to choose the method that best fits their schedule and learning style. Kaplan also provides detailed study guides and progress tracking tools to keep students on course.

User Experiences and Feedback: Kaplan Real Estate Education is highly praised for its comprehensive and engaging course content. Students appreciate the variety of learning options, from live interactive sessions to on-demand videos, which cater to different learning preferences. The structured format and in-depth materials make it easier for students to grasp complex real estate concepts. Many students find Kaplan’s exam prep resources to be invaluable, contributing to their success in passing the licensing exams.

Pre-Licensing

Price Starts at: $799
Basic Package Features: The Colorado Real Estate Licensing course offers online video courses, live online learning, and additional study tools, including Colorado and National QBanks and exam prep video courses.
Upgrade Packages: Include Supplemental materials include print textbooks and workbooks, a language of real estate textbook with audio, flashcards, and a real estate math video course with a corresponding textbook. Career preparation is supported by an online real estate accelerator course with live coaching.

Exam Prep

Price Starts at: $99
Basic Package Features: Kaplan’s 2-day Colorado real estate license exam prep course provides expert support to help you feel confident on exam day. Choose between online or in-person options, with faculty coaching you through the entire exam prep process.
Upgrade Packages: Yes, they have a live online learning hub

Continuing Education

The Colorado Division of Real Estate requires brokers and employing brokers to complete 24 hours of continuing education every three years, including three different 4-hour Annual Commission Update (ACU) courses. The remaining 12 hours can be electives. Proof of completion must be retained for at least four years and provided upon request.

Price Starts at: $24
Basic Package Features: There are all sorts of single courses offered, some of which are required, like: Annual Commission Update Live Online Class (4-Credit Hours), and Annual Commission Update Online Video Course (4-Credit Hours). Other courses include but are not limited to: Real Estate Bloopers: Preventing Client Horror Stories (4-Credit Hours), Tech Impact and the Real Estate Vocation (2-Credit Hours), 8-Hour Live Online CE Package: Five Biggest Challenges in Today’s Market: Solved with ACU, Colorado Contracts and Closings Home Study Course (Reinstatement) (72-Credit Hours), and many more.

Learning Formats: Kaplan Real Estate Education offers a variety of learning formats, including live online classes, on-demand video courses, and traditional textbooks. The courses are structured to be engaging, combining interactive elements, videos, and practice quizzes to enhance understanding and retention.

Course Access: Students have access to their Kaplan courses for up to six months, allowing flexibility in completing the material at their own pace.

Refund Policy: Kaplan provides a 30-day refund policy, allowing students to cancel their purchase and receive a full refund if they have not accessed more than 50% of the course content.

Exam Preparation: Kaplan includes comprehensive exam prep materials such as practice exams, detailed study guides, and a real estate math course. They also offer live online exam prep classes to ensure students are well-prepared for their licensing exams.

Student Support: Kaplan offers customer support through phone, email, and live chat. Support is available six days a week, ensuring students receive assistance with any issues they might encounter.

Additional Resources: Kaplan provides a wide range of elective courses for continuing education (CE), covering topics such as real estate finance and advanced property management. These courses are available in multiple states and are designed to keep students up-to-date with industry standards

Pros:

  • Wide variety of learning formats, including live online and on-demand video courses
  • Comprehensive exam prep resources, including practice exams and study guides
  • Highly experienced instructors and well-regarded course content

Cons:

  • Higher price point compared to some competitors
  • Limited access period for course materials

To view their current pricing for pre-licensing, first click this linked button, then choose your State from the dropdown menu on the right of “Get Certified In:” and click “Continue” you will see the prices on the next screen.

Our Review Process:

At SmartAgentAlliance, our goal is to provide accurate and helpful reviews of online real estate schools to assist prospective real estate agents in making informed decisions. Our review process involves several key steps:

Research and Data Collection:

We begin by gathering comprehensive information about each real estate school, including course offerings, pricing, accreditation, and user reviews. This involves visiting the schools’ websites, reading third-party reviews, and gathering feedback from current and former students.
